Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: A perfumed nose showcases strawberry, anise and tea spice aromatics. Experience ripe, fresh raspberry, red plums and strawberry compote with a hint of subtle cedar. The fine texture and silky tannins enhance the vanilla, brown sugar, and leather notes on the finish.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Color: intense ruby red, with pale pomegranate highlights. Bouquet: decisive, fine, broad and lingering with hints of vanilla, cherry, raspberry, and licorice. Flavor: dry, warm, smooth, well-textured and lingering on the palate.

Name: Radian Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: This wine has intense chalky minerality, which is evident on the nose along with high toned, red fruits, some baking spices (nutmeg) and earth. It has terrific concentration, smooth texture, and energetic, yet pliant structure.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: conveys vivid aromas and avors of black cherry, satsuma plum and blood orange with bay leaf, fresh tobacco and cocoa nib adding further dimension. The palate oers a generous, beautifully extracted texture, all of which is kept in balance by the freshness of the fruit that one nds on the mountain, and an indelible stony signature

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
Wine Description: It is a wine with expressive fruit, an opulent nose of red berries, roundness on the palate, with good length and a harmonious and elegant finish. Qualities of fruit, together with greater aromas and tannins.

Name: Merlot Beau Terre Vineyard
Wine Description: has a deep, generous jammy blackberry nose with a hint of ripe strawberry and sweet mocha. Lively and balanced on the palate, young and curvy, with little pockets of tannin going off down the long finish.

Name: Serpico
Wine Description: Colore rosso rubino. Bouquet complesso di confettura di ciliegia, spezie dolci, liquirizia, caffè e cacao. Equilibrato in bocca. Spiccata mineralità e grande persistenza.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley
Wine Description: It is the essence of the year with its sweet, radiant fruit and bouquet of freshly cut flowers, spices, mint and sweet red berries. The flavors are bright, focused and delineated, with gorgeous underlying salinity and tension. Racy and polished, this is a fabulous Cabernet Sauvignon to drink now and over the next decade.

Name: Monte Rosso Zinfandel
Wine Description: It has beautiful, rich, elegant and sophisticated. Exotic fruit aromatics such as mango and lychee are backed by hints of maple, brown sugar, vanilla bean, red licorice and white pepper.

Name: Bridesmaid Red Blend of Cabernet Franc
Giorgio Primo
Wine Description: It has youthful on the eye, super deep purple and almost opaque to the rim. The nose offers up sweet plummy fruit and dried tea leaves. The palate is very fruit forward and super ripe blackberry flavours, sharp acidity, noticable alcohol and drying tannnins on the finish.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Intense color and aromas with ample notes of red berries. On the palate gives a body of great balance with tannins well integrated into the structure, which ensures elegance and longevity.

Name: Rompecabezas
Wine Description: Darkly colored and highly aromatic, notes of whitebark raspberries, violets, nutmeg and marjoram emanate from the glass. The flavors are mouthwateringly appealing, with dusty tannins and vibrant natural acidity, bringing notes of wild cherries, fennel, charcuterie, earl gray, pomegranate and toasted Hungarian paprika. Certainly a pleasantly complex puzzle of flavors and textures

Name: Malbec
Wine Description: It has growing season was near perfect, with ideal spring budbreak and warm, steady days balanced by cool nights. The steady weather continued into the fall, resulting in optimal ripening conditions at harvest. Our 2012 Mt. Brave Malbec opens with dark, ripe raspberry and huckleberry with spicy undertones. The sturdy structure reveals that this is a true mountain wine.

Name: Papillon
Wine Description: Bright, ruby red in complexion with a lively perfume of crushed boysenberry, spring flowers, crème de cassis, and a hint of toast. Lush flavors of blackberry tart and ripe plum lead to a juicy mid-palate mix of currant, mocha and dark chocolate. Well-integrated, polished tannins are present on the finish, which linger effortlessly with just the right amount of power and intensity.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Atlas Peak
Wine Description: definitely tastes like mountain fruit, with the deep cherry fruit you expect, nice milk chocolate notes, and a hint of fresh herb that keeps it interesting. There are plenty of tannins but they're well-managed.

Name: Pomerol
Wine Description: A classic nose with a silky, structured, balanced and intense palate with gripping tannins and a long finish.

Name: Poulsard de l' Ami Karl Arbois
Moulis-en-Médoc
Wine Description: It is generally sumptuous in colour, with a particularly subtle and pleasantly fruity aromatic strength, very ripe and concentrated flavours. It is harmoniously balanced, expressive and generous, with finesse and elegance. It has a great length on the palate, with a lively appeal and remarkable cellaring potential thanks to very fine, yet clearly present, tannins.

Name: The Revivalist Merlot
Wine Description: This is tight, lithe and elegant: a composed and dignified Merlot with only the faintest initial glimpse of anything resembling mellow. It smells comforting at first, but as the drinker delves, the bouquet unveils mossy, damp forest earth, and then fresher, leafy greens emerge with their tannins.

Name: Saint-Estèphe
Wine Description: This is a rich and powerful wine, with a great aromatic complexity. It presents powerful tannins, a rich bouquet underlined by a fleshy, full structure that will gain in finesse as the years go by, giving a complex and elegant wine.

Name: Mater Matuta Lazio Rosso
Wine Description: A deep, dense, ruby-red wine which displays outstanding personality both on the nose and on the palate with its aroma of coffee beans, violets, ripe black cherry, coriander, nutmeg and cinnamon. Silky and seductive, but perfectly supported by fine tannins and a pleasing astringency, Mater Matuta delivers a long, lush finish.

Name: Zio Tony Ranch Grace Nicole Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The Zio Tony Ranch Pinot Noir has a forward nose of cherry, licorice and spice box. Layers of plum, red raspberry and cola are well integrated in the mouth.

Name: Aloxe-Corton
Wine Description: This wine could almost seem ‘gourmand’ and for early-drinking if the ripe tannins and the structure on the finish did not come to remind us we are dealing with a wine for keeping.

Name: Harmonie
Wine Description: Classic full-bodied, seamless texture that is common from this estate as well as tons of sweet black raspberries, creamy licorice and spice aromas and flavors.

Name: Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It is lush with rich fruit-forward flavors such as dark raspberry and blackberry, intermingled with notes of black cherry, pipe tobacco, bittersweet chocolate, violets and spice.

Name: Valpolicella Classico Superiore
Wine Description: Ruby red color of medium intensity with refl exes grenade aging eye. notes of ripe cherries, cherries and plums slightly wilted nose. soft and enveloping the mouth, with a pleasant flavor and frutt notes mature and spices taste.

Name: Poggio Valente
Wine Description: It has an intense ruby red colour with orange reflections which denote the evolution of Sangiovese throughout the years.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Howell Mountain
Wine Description: It is dark purple in color with aromas of violets, raspberries, blueberry compote, black tea and vanilla bean. Focused flavors of wild cherry jam, crème de cassis, plum butter, caramelized sugar, and mocha are followed by a long finish with integrated acidity and palate filling tannins.

Name: Vieilles Vignes Santenay
Wine Description: Red berry fruit, plum and pepper leads to delicious, round and nicely plump flavors that possess good mid-palate concentration and verve on the persistent finish.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Complex flavor profile of subtle cherry, spice and coffee while the Woodward Canyon property offers more earth. Notes of black cherry, spiced oak, leather and earth are in the aroma. This wine is generous and balanced enough to enjoy now, yet with the complexity and structure.

Name: Coudoulet de Beaucastel Côtes-du-Rhône
Wine Description: Dark garnet in color, fading to pink at the rim. Full bodied, smooth textured and well structured, with good length, this one really benefits from some extended air, as the fruit turns richer and sweeter.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This wine’s aroma is heavily cherry oriented with sprinklings of red and black currant, bay leaf and strawberry preserve. Flavors on the palate are of dried cherry, fruit leather, and thistle. The strong structure is very apparent on the front palate and moves to a textured mid and back palate, with a long finish.

Name: Syrah
Wine Description: It has deep and sensual ruby red in the glass. The unique climate for Rhone varietals develops savory notes of sage, smoked bacon and soy glaze on the nose. Dark red berries, lush and juicy red plum meet with cracked black pepper and pink peppercorns.

Name: Toscana I Sodi di San Niccolo
Wine Description: It is especially dark, powerful and brooding. Black fruit, smoke, tar and incense are some of the many notes that flow from a structured, tense frame. I Sodi di San Niccolo is 85% Sangioveto and 15% Malvasia Nera aged in French oak barrels.

Name: Barbaresco Santo Stefano
Wine Description: Brilliant garnet, typical of wines obtained from Nebbiolo grapes. Elegant, its varietal perfumes marry perfectly with fresh eucalyptus notes typical of this particular vineyard, slightly withered flowers pink, purple and a sweet spices aftertaste. Balanced tannins with a refreshing acidity. Notable harmony, structure and persistence.

Name: Fe Ciega Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The wine has a medium dark ruby color the nose is classic Fe Ciega, with floral notes leading to aromas of black cherries with hints of sage and cedar.The tannins are silky, and the oak flavors are so well integrated as to almost not be perceived. The wine’s acidity provides for a long, lingering finish.

Name: Margaux
Wine Description: This has dark red color and the on notes of ripe fruit, clay, graphite, peppery strawberry. The mouth is serious.

Name: The Leap Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The Leap Cabernet Sauvignon opens with an alluring aromatic bouquet of black plum compote, black cherry, black raspberry and forest floor, and a welcomed hint of cocoa powder. On the palate, a lushness of rich, darkfruit arises from the cooler vintage, and the flavors are later enhanced by intriguing dusty notes of pepper.

Name: Red Blend
Wine Description: Rich dark color, floral notes and polished tannins.

Name: Barolo Gavarini Chiniera
Wine Description: Grasso's 2011 Barolo Gavarini Vigna Chiniera captures the essence and personality of the year in its inviting, radiant personality. Bright red stone fruits, crushed rocks, pine, mint and flowers are all lifted and aromatically expressive in the glass. The Gavarini is already quite open and inviting. I imagine it will offer a wide window of pure drinking pleasure over the next 20 years or so. This is a striking Barolo from the Grasso family.

Name: Gigondas
Wine Description: Complex nose offers scents of strawberry, raspberry, fresh flowers, minerals and Asian spices. Focused and pure, reminiscent of a serious Burgundy, with sweet red berry flavors and a firming note of cherry skin. Silky tannins add focus to the long, sappy finish.
